column1: Ladies' man Danny has a new roommate, Justin. When he moves in, Danny ends up unintentionally adopting Justin's ragtag group of awkward friends as well. Danny decides to put his skill to use and begins a mission to school them in the ways of romancing a date. As the first lesson, he brings them to an event that his sister is hosting. Things seem to be off to a good start, but in the cold light of the following morning, it's clear that Danny has a lot of work ahead of him to make his new friends dateable.
